title: Colorized Western | Abilene Town (1946) Randolph Scott, Lloyd Bridges | subtitles

sources.title: Colorized Western | Abilene Town (1946) Randolph Scott, Lloyd Bridges | subtitles
sources.description:
A Wild West Journey of Cowboys and Conflict in Kansas !
A sheriff tries to stop homesteader conflicts in the West after the Civil War. Ablaze with guns and guts and glory!

Original title: Abilene Town (1946)

Original Black & White version https://youtu.be/i3fR5QHESAk

Director: Edwin L. Marin
Writers: Ernest Haycox, Harold Shumate 
Stars: Randolph Scott, Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan & Lloyd Bridges
Genre: Colorized classics, Western

This movie has German, Italian & Spanish dubbed audio options
